title: Josh Hamilton
summary: Joshua Holt Hamilton (born May 21, 1981) is an American former professional baseball outfielder. He played in Major League Baseball (MLB) with the Cincinnati Reds (2007), Texas Rangers (2008-2012, 2015), and Los Angeles Angels of Anaheim (2013â€“2014). Hamilton was a five-time MLB All-Star and won the American League Most Valuable Player Award (MVP) in 2010.
